title: Cafe Oranje
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, European, Dutch, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Dutch-style coffeehouse and cafe in Hamilton's international village. Vegan savory-pies, quinoa salads, and often vegan soups for lunch. Many locally-sourced vegan baked goods, including donuts, pie, and Nanaimo bars. Fair-trade coffee, espresso bar with vegan options (soy milk) and other beverages. Enjoy the relaxed atmosphere and old-world hospitality.
